summary.span: 强制地终止基础 TCP 连接，会导致任何显著的 I/O 失败。

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

summary.span: 可使用此方法来响应恶意 HTTP 客户端的攻击。

span.span: You might use this method in response to an attack by a malicious HTTP client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是线程安全的。This method is thread-safe. 任何线程可能随时对它进行调用。Any thread may call it at any time. 此方法仅可以在集成模式下使用。This method can only be used in integrated mode. 如果在经典模式下调用它，将引发异常。If you invoke it in classic mode, an exception is thrown. 若要确定管道模式，请使用。To determine the pipeline mode, use .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnonymousID As String
public: property System::String ^ AnonymousID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户的匿名标识符(如果存在)。

span.span: Gets the anonymous identifier for the user, if present.

value.span: 表示当前匿名用户标识符的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the current anonymous user identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将长期存在的唯一标识符分配给未经身份验证用户，这可以用于跟踪用户或为该用户分配配置文件属性，而不将数据存储在`Session`对象。The property assigns a long-lived unique identifier to a non-authenticated user, which can be used to track the user or assign profile properties to that user without storing data in a `Session` object. 默认情况下，使用 cookie，跟踪属性，但可以将其设置为使用 URI 时匿名标识配置部分中的属性设置为， ，或值。By default, the property is tracked using a cookie, but it can be set to use the URI when the attribute in the anonymous identification configuration section is set to either the , , or value. 如果你不再需要可用，例如可以匿名用户进行身份验证，则必须显式清除 cookie。You must explicitly clear the cookie if you no longer want it available, for example when an anonymous user is authenticated. 需要确定未经过身份验证的实体时，并需要授权时，使用匿名标识。Anonymous identification is used when there is a need to identify entities that are not authenticated and when authorization is required. 有关详细信息，请参阅[anonymousIdentification 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2bd927ef-9057-4703-9c55-4cfb6d7d0929)For more information, see [anonymousIdentification Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2bd927ef-9057-4703-9c55-4cfb6d7d0929) ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性通过处理Global.asax 文件中的事件。The following example shows how to use the property by handling the event in the Global.asax file. 此示例具有两个部分：This example has two parts: - 处理的 Global.asax 文件中的方法事件。A method in the Global.asax file that handles the event. - Web 窗体页中。A Web Forms page. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何设置属性通过处理Global.asax 文件中的事件。The first part of the code example shows how to set the property by handling the event in the Global.asax file. 名为的方法`AnonymousIdentification_Creating`设置属性时创建一个匿名的 ID。The method that is named `AnonymousIdentification_Creating` sets the property when an anonymous ID is created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/CS/global_asax.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/vb/global_asax.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分演示如何显示新，它由创建`AnonymousIdentification_Creating`前面示例中的事件处理程序。The second part of the code example shows how to display the new that is created by the `AnonymousIdentification_Creating` event handler in the preceding example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/CS/anonid_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/vb/anonid_vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationPath As String
public: property System::String ^ ApplicationPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取服务器上 ASP.NET 应用程序的虚拟应用程序根路径。

span.span: Gets the ASP.NET application's virtual application root path on the server.

value.span: 当前应用程序的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于构造相对于从页或不在根目录下的 Web 用户控件的应用程序根 URL。Use this property to construct a URL relative to the application root from a page or Web user control that is not in the root directory. 这允许页面和存在于目录结构，以便使用相同的代码将链接到应用程序中的固定位置的资源的不同级别的共享的控件。This allows pages and shared controls that exist at different levels of a directory structure to use the same code to link to resources at fixed locations in the application. ## Examples 下面的示例使用进行 HTML 编码的方法然后将的值写入到文本文件的属性。The following example uses the method to HTML-encode and then write the value of the property to a text file. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 它假定存在对象名为`sw`。It assumes the existence of a object named `sw`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1/CS/requestdetailscs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1/VB/requestdetailsvb.aspx#2)] 下面的示例使用属性以编程方式构造的资源是在应用程序中的固定位置的路径。The following example uses the property to programmatically construct a path to a resource that is in a fixed location in the application. 引用该资源的页没有位于与资源相同的目录。The page that references the resource does not have to be located in the same directory as the resource. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/CS/ApplicationPath.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/VB/ApplicationPath.aspx#2)] 如果你运行此示例中的 Web 应用程序名为 WebSite1，`/WebSite1`将显示的值为属性和`/WebSite1/images/Image1.gif`将显示为图像的完整路径。If you run this example in a Web application that is named WebSite1, `/WebSite1` will be displayed as the value of the property and `/WebSite1/images/Image1.gif` will be displayed as the complete path of the image.

summary.span: 获取应用程序根目录的虚拟路径，并通过对应用程序根目录使用波形符(~)表示法，将该路径转变为相对路径(如 "~/page.aspx" 的形式)。

span.span: Gets the virtual path of the application root and makes it relative by using the tilde (~) notation for the application root (as in "~/page.aspx").

value.span: 当前请求的应用程序根的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path of the application root for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于提供 URL 将保持相同，即使应用程序更改位置的信息。Use this property to provide URL information that will stay the same even if the application changes location. 这样，相同的 URL 映射代码将用于在测试环境中和在最终部署环境中，或要使用的不同域中的 Web 应用程序的副本。This allows the same URL-mapping code to be used in a test environment and in the final deployment environment, or to be used by copies of Web applications in different domains. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性设置的 URL页位于同一目录中的图像的控件。The following example uses the property to set the URL of an control to an image in the same directory as the page. 在目录结构，以查看生成的不同级别上运行此页属性值。Run this page at different levels of a directory structure to see the resulting property values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath/CS/AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPathCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath/VB/AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPathVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例使用属性以编程方式将路径设置到资源时，基于页的当前路径。The following example uses the property to programmatically set the path to a resource, based on the current path of the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/CS/apprelativecurrentexecutionfilepath.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/VB/apprelativecurrentexecutionfilepath.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取客户端发送的 cookie 的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of cookies sent by the client.

value.span: 表示客户端的 cookie 变量的 对象。

span.span: An object representing the client's cookie variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 包括两个内部 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 通过访问的集合集合包含传输到中的服务器客户端的 cookie`Cookie`标头。The collection accessed through the collection of contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 通过访问的集合集合包含新 cookie 在服务器上创建和传输到客户端在`Set-Cookie`标头。The collection accessed through the collection of contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header. > [!NOTE] > 通过使用添加 cookie 后集合，cookie 可立即在集合，即使不向客户端发送响应。After you add a cookie by using the collection, the cookie is immediately available in the collection, even if the response has not been sent to the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例循环访问客户端发送的所有 cookie，并将名称、 到期日期、 安全参数和值的每个 cookie 发送到 HTTP 输出。The following code example loops through all cookies sent by the client and sends the name, expiration date, security parameter, and values of each cookie to the HTTP output. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的另一种使用属性。This method provides an alternative to using the property. 属性等待，直到它返回之前收到整个请求对象。The property waits until the whole request has been received before it returns a object. 与此相反，方法返回立即对象。In contrast, the method returns the object immediately. 该方法可用于开始收到正文的完整内容之前处理的实体正文。You can use the method to begin processing the entity body before the complete contents of the body have been received. 实体正文 （或尽可能它作为你的请求，并已接收） 仅在您使用的对象时，才返回此方法通过调用方法，如读取流，返回方法。The entity body (or as much of it as you request and has been received) is returned only when you use the object that is returned by this method to read the stream, by calling methods such as the method. 使用参数方法，以指定要读取的实体正文。You use parameters of the method to specify how much of the entity body to read. 对象从此方法由 ASP.NET 支持同步和异步读取的方法。The object returned by ASP.NET from this method supports both synchronous and asynchronous read methods. 对象同时实现和方法。The object implements both the and methods. 异步方法，可以异步读取请求实体中的区块，同时 ASP.NET 释放当前线程之间的异步读取循环每次迭代。The asynchronous methods let you asynchronously read the request entity in chunks, while ASP.NET releases the current thread in between each iteration of an asynchronous read loop. 如果请求为上载较大的文件，并且你想要开始访问该文件的内容在上载完成之前，此方法会很有用。This method can be useful if the request is uploading a large file and you want to begin accessing the file contents before the upload is finished. 但是，你应仅使用此方法对于方案要接管实体正文的所有处理。However, you should only use this method for scenarios where you want to take over all processing of the entity body. 这意味着你无法使用此方法从.aspx 页面中，这是因为.aspx 页将运行时，实体正文已被读取。This means that you cannot use this method from an .aspx page, because by the time an .aspx page runs, the entity body has already been read.

summary.span: 为用于将 HTTP 请求实体正文插入内存的 IIS 方法提供托管包装。

span.span: Provides a managed wrapper for the IIS method that inserts an HTTP request entity body into memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载提供对 IIS 7 的托管的访问`IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody`方法。The method overloads provide managed access to the IIS 7 `IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody` method. IIS 方法将插入内存的 HTTP 请求实体正文 （客户端发布的数据）。The IIS method inserts an HTTP request entity body (the data that is posted by a client) into memory. 这很有用，因为 IIS 已读取之后不保留一份请求实体。This is useful because IIS does not maintain a copy of the request entity after it has been read. 方法创建 HTTP 请求实体数据的副本并使其可供 IIS 进行额外的自定义处理。The methods create a copy of the HTTP request entity data and make it available to IIS for additional custom handling. > [!NOTE] > 方法重载工作仅 IIS 7.0 或更高版本，因为`IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody`方法已添加在 IIS 7.0 中。The method overloads work only on IIS 7.0 or later, because the `IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody` method was added in IIS 7.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它已被读取后，IIS 不维护一份请求。IIS does not maintain a copy of the request after it has been read. 因此，建议仅 HTTP 请求的处理程序应读取请求实体。Therefore, it is recommended that only the handler for an HTTP request should read the request entity. 方法重载向 IIS 提供一份请求实体如果 ASP.NET 已以前读取。The method overload provides IIS with a copy of the request entity if it was previously read by ASP.NET. 此方法重载可用于其中 ASP.NET 具有读取实体请求，但想要重用现有的请求数据的情况。This method overload is useful for cases where ASP.NET has read the entity request and you want to reuse the existing request data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 属性可能包含敏感信息有关的宿主环境。The property potentially contains sensitive information about the hosting environment. 返回值不应该向用户显示。The return value should not be displayed to users. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法要转换到服务器上的完全限定的物理路径的虚拟路径。The following code example uses the method to convert a virtual path to a fully qualified physical path on the server. 此示例具有两个部分：This example has two parts: - 一个.aspx 页面的路径映射，读取该文件，并显示读取操作的结果。An .aspx page maps the path, reads the file, and displays results of the read operation. - 类， `UpperCaseFilterStream`，更改为大写形式传递它的所有字符。A class, `UpperCaseFilterStream`, that changes all characters passed through it to uppercase. 该示例的第一部分演示如何将虚拟路径转换为完全限定的物理路径使用方法。The first part of the example shows how to convert a virtual path to a fully qualified physical path using the method. 然后传递给此物理路径对象，它可以通过获取文件的内容。This physical path is then passed to a object, which obtains the contents of the file. 方法然后调用以显示在页面上的文件的内容。The method is then called to display the content of the file on the page. 属性用于将筛选器附加到使到全部大写页上显示的文本的响应流。The property is used to attach a filter to the response stream that makes the text displayed to the page all uppercase. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2/CS/requestsamples2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2/VB/requestsamples2vb.aspx#1)] 该示例的第二部分显示继承自的类，并将流中的所有字符都转换为大写形式。The second part of the example shows a class that inherits from and converts all characters in a stream to uppercase. 此代码放入`App_Code`应用程序文件夹。Put this code in the `App_Code` folder for your application. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示两种方式来获取名为"fullname"的查询字符串变量的值。The following code example shows two ways to get the value of a query string variable named "fullname". 在每个情况下，如果 URL 是`http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?fullname=Fadi%20Fakhouri`，则返回的值是"Fadi Fakhouri"，因为`%20`是 URL 解码为一个空格字符。In each case, if the URL is `http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?fullname=Fadi%20Fakhouri`, then the value returned is "Fadi Fakhouri" because the `%20` is URL-decoded into a space character. 如果 URL 不具有`fullname`查询字符串 ID，返回的值将为`null`。If the URL doesn’t have a `fullname` query string ID, the returned value would be `null`. 第一行代码查找密钥仅在查询字符串中; 中的"fullname"第二行查找密钥"fullname"中的所有 HTTP 请求集合。The first line of code looks for the key "fullname" only in the query string; the second line looks for the key "fullname" in all of the HTTP request collections. 第二个行有关的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the second line, see . ```csharp string fullname1 = Request.QueryString["fullname"]; string fullname2 = Request["fullname"]; ``` ```vb Dim fullname1 As String = Request.QueryString("fullname") Dim fullname2 As String = Request("fullname") ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimedOutToken As CancellationToken
public: property System::Threading::CancellationToken TimedOutToken { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

summary.span: 获取请求超时时去除的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that is tripped when a request times out.

value.span: 取消标记。

span.span: The cancellation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在 Web.config 文件中指定的超时期限 (请参阅) 或以编程方式 (请参阅)。The timeout period can be specified in the Web.config file (see ) or programmatically (see ). 从请求传入的时间为单位的超时期限。The timeout period is measured from the time the request comes in. 如果默认超时为 110 秒有效时，将不早于 110 秒在请求处理开始后触发取消标记。If the default timeout of 110 seconds is in effect, the cancellation token will be tripped no earlier than 110 seconds after request processing begins. 你可以更改属性值，并且尚未尚未触发长此令牌，如新的超时值将遵循此提示。You can change the property value, and as long this token hasn't tripped yet, the new timeout value will be respected. 当前令牌仅提供 15 秒的粒度级，这意味着，如果超时值为 110 秒，将一段时间之间 110 和 125 秒在请求处理开始后触发令牌。Currently the token only provides 15 second granularity, which means that if the timeout value is 110 seconds, the token will be tripped sometime between 110 and 125 seconds after request processing begins. 粒度可能在以后发生更改。The granularity may change in the future. 即使此属性是线程安全的没有对其使用限制。Even though this property is thread-safe, there are restrictions on its use. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此属性是 Websocket 请求处理已启动的情况下无意义。This property is meaningless if WebSockets request processing has started.

summary.span: 获取 HTTP 请求值，不触发请求验证。

span.span: Gets the HTTP request values without triggering request validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求为 HTML 标记和脚本可能表明潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的验证检查。Request validation checks for HTML markup and script that might indicate a potential cross-site scripting attack. 默认情况下，使用请求验证检查的所有值，如果任何值包含标记或脚本，ASP.NET 将引发异常。By default, all values are checked using request validation and if any values contain markup or script, ASP.NET throws an exception. 使用此方法，如果你预料到的请求将包含标记 （例如，你允许用户发布的内容，其中包含标记） 和你想要获取请求的原始值。Use this method if you anticipate that the request will contain markup (for example, you are allowing users to post content that contains markup) and you want to get the raw value of a request. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用此属性，你必须手动检查潜在的跨站点脚本攻击的数据。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

summary.span: 获取客户端语言首选项的排序字符串数组。

value.span: 经过排序的客户端语言首选项的字符串数组，或者，如果为空，则为 。

span.span: A sorted string array of client language preferences, or if empty.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过返回的多个值捕获属性转换成字符串数组，并将每个语言名称写入 HTTP 输出的单独的行。The following code example captures the multiple values returned by the property into a string array and writes each language name to a separate line of HTTP output. 语言名称由浏览器中，并且没有权威所有可能的代码的列表。The language names are provided by the browser, and there is no definitive list of all possible codes. 通常这些包含的语言、 连字符，以及对于区域性的两个字符的代码的两个字符代码如"en-我们"适用于美国英语和"fr 的 ca"加拿大法语。Typically these consist of a two-character codes for the language, a hyphen, and a two-character code for the culture, such as "en-us" for U.S. English and "fr-ca" for Canadian French. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpRequest.UserLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpRequest.UserLanguages Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpRequest.UserLanguages Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpRequest.UserLanguages Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ValidateInput() cil managed

summary.span: 引发对通过 、 和 属性访问的集合的验证。

span.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用的输入的验证标志以跟踪是否通过访问的请求集合上执行验证， ，和属性。The class uses input validation flags to track whether to perform validation on the request collections accessed through the , , and properties. 方法设置这些标志这样，当 get 访问器， ，或调用属性、 输入验证。The method sets these flags so that when the get accessors for the , , or property are invoked, input validation is performed. 验证工作原理是检查所有输入的数据与潜在的危险数据的硬编码列表。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data. 如果通过页指令或配置启用了验证功能，在该页面的过程中调用此方法`ProcessRequest`处理阶段。If the validation feature is enabled by page directive or configuration, this method is called during the page's `ProcessRequest` processing phase. 可以由你的代码调用方法，如果未启用验证功能。The method can be called by your code if the validation feature is not enabled.

exception.span: 从客户端接收到具有潜在危险的数据。

span.span: Potentially dangerous data was received from the client.
